import React from "react"; import "./signin.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Button, FormGroup, Form, Input, InputGroup, NavLink } from "reactstrap"; import "../assets/css/custom.css"; import Header from "../common/header.js"; class SigninPage extends React.Component { render() { return (
رمز عبور را فراموش کردم!
حسابه ثبت نام پشتیبانی
); } } export default SigninPage;
